glsa.title: libTIFF: Multiple buffer overflows
glsa.synopsis: libTIFF contains buffer overflows that could result in arbitrary code execution.

background.p: libTIFF provides support for reading and manipulating TIFF images.

description.p: A buffer overflow has been found in the t2p_write_pdf_string function in tiff2pdf, which can been triggered with a TIFF file containing a DocumentName tag with UTF-8 characters. An additional buffer overflow has been found in the handling of the parameters in tiffsplit.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to load a specially crafted TIFF file, resulting in the possible execution of arbitrary code.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
